meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a drupe.
meanings.sent1: The drupaceous peach had a pit inside.
meanings.sent2: The small, drupaceous fruits hung from the tree.
meanings.sent3: The drupaceous plum rolled off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her drupaceous necklace was a cluster of colorful beads.
meanings.sent5: The drupaceous berries glistened in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics of a drupe.
meanings.sent1: The drupaceous skin of the fruit was smooth and shiny.
meanings.sent2: The drupaceous taste of the peach was sweet and juicy.
meanings.sent3: She wore a drupaceous hat made of small fruits.
meanings.sent4: The drupaceous aroma of the orchard filled the air.
meanings.sent5: The drupaceous texture of the coconut was rough and fibrous.

meanings.definition: Consisting of or relating to drupes.
meanings.sent1: The drupaceous tree bore fruits with a hard shell.
meanings.sent2: The drupaceous dessert was made with various stone fruits.
meanings.sent3: He painted a drupaceous landscape with cherry trees.
meanings.sent4: The drupaceous garden was filled with plum trees.
meanings.sent5: The drupaceous juice was extracted from the ripe peaches.
